data.title: Air Aviation Support
data.text:
Homepage

Beyond the clouds,

always at your service

At your service since 2018, Air Aviation Support has developed a range of tailor-made services designed to meet all your aviation needs 24/7.

Nous contacter

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

About Us

Since 2018, Air Aviation Support has been positioning itself as an international specialist in terms of on-demand aviation services that include flight planning, traffic rights, ground handling, in-flight catering, concierge, charter services, and much more.

About us

Tons of Fuel

Our Services

To provide tailored, and qualitative services throughout the flight of our clients. Customer orientation is the heart of our business model. Adaptive standards are the core metric to reach customer satisfaction. We are committed to providing you with the finest quality at the most competitive rates.

Ground Handling

Transition through airport procedures,

baggage handling, and aircraft services.

Ground Handling Learn more

Flight Planning

From selecting the best routes

to coordinating with air traffic control.

Flight Planning Learn more

In-Flight Catering

Indulge in a sky-high dining experience where every dish is a masterpiece,

meticulously crafted to elevate your journey with unparalleled flavors and sophistication

In-Flight Catering Learn more

Fueling

Our comprehensive fuel services

ensure that your aircraft is always ready to take flight.

Fueling Learn more

Flight Dispatch

Coordinating flight plans, monitoring weather conditions,

and ensuring compliance with regulations.

Flight Dispatch Learn more

Concierge

From creating itineraries to managing transfers

and booking luxury establishments.

Concierge Learn more

Photo and video shoot

Showcasing your latest aircraft models,

filming promotional material,

or conducting photo shoots for advertising campaigns

Photo and video shoot Learn more
